SM.1.1.activity: Is there a formal SDL (Software Development Lifecycle) used?

SM.1.4.activity: Is there Continuous Integration (with SDL security hooks)?

SM.2.2.activity: Are there at least two deployment pipelines? (one with the ability to block the release)

CP.1.1.activity: Are there any regulatory or compliance drivers? (to do Security)

CP.1.2.activity: Have Data protections obligations been identified?

CP.2.1.activity: Does the application hold Audience Data?

CP.2.4.activity: Do 3rd Party vendor contracts have software security SLAs?

CP.2.5.activity: Are executives aware of compliance and privacy obligations?

T1.1.activity: Have all developers received Application Security Awareness training?

T1.2.activity: Have all developers received role-specific Application Security training?

T1.6.activity: Is training material specific to current tech stack and company history?

T1.7.activity: Is there on-demand individual security training?

T2.5.activity: Do new hires receive Application Security Training?

T3.4.activity: Is there an annual refresh of Application Security Training?

AM.1.2.activity: Is there an data classification scheme?

AM.1.2.1.activity: Is there an inventory of how application maps to data classification scheme?

AM.1.3.activity: Is there a mapping of the attackers to be worried about?

AM.1.4.activity: Is there information on past attacks (successful or not)?

SFD.1.1.activity: Are there standard security features? (i.e. Secure Controls)

SDF.1.2.activity: Are InfoSec involved Architecture and Design?

SDF.1.2.1.activity: Are Security Champions doing Threat Models for existing/new Apps or features?

SR.1.1.activity: Are there Security Standards for development?

SR.1.2.activity: Is there an Software Security Portal?

SR.1.3.activity: Are there Software requirements based on Compliance constraints?

SR.2.4.activity: Are Open Source components usage tracked?

SR.2.4.1.activity: For 3rd party dependencies or apps, are Open Source components usage tracked?

AA.1.4.activity: Is there a risk questionnaire to rank Applications and Features?

CR.1.1.activity: Is there a list of the most dangerous bugs/vulnerabilities that developers should be aware of?

CR.1.2.activity: Have Security Reviews (CIS) been done to the released applications?

CR.1.5.activity: Have security-focused code reviews been done on released applications?

ST.1.1.activity: Does QA perform basic Security or Adversarial tests?

ST.1.3.activity: Are security requirements and security features used to drive tests?

ST.2.1.activity: Are there BlackBox (DAST) tools executed by QA?

ST.2.3.activity: Is risk analysis used to drive tests?

ST.2.5.activity: Are there automated security tests executed by QA?

ST.2.6.activity: Are there Fuzz tests executed by QA?

ST.3.4.activity: Is Code Coverage measured for Security tools/tests execution?

PT.1.2.activity: Are penetration tests results added to JIRA?

PT.2.2.activity: Do penetration testers have access to all available information?

PT.2.3.activity: Is there an periodic penetration testing schedule?

SE.1.1.activity: Is application live input captured and monitored?

SE.1.1.1.activity: Is live data sent to InfoSec monitoring systems?

SE.1.1.2.activity: Is there an WAF protecting the applications?

SE.1.2.activity: Are hosts and networks configured securely?

SE.2.2.activity: Are there secure installation and deployment guidelines?

SE.3.3.activity: Are live applications monitored for misbehaviours or signs of attacks?

CMVM.1.1.activity: Is there an incident response plan?

CMVM.1.2.activity: Are bugs and security issues being identified via live monitoring?

CMVM.2.1.activity: Is there an emergency codebase response plan? (i.e. quickly push code fixes to production)

CMVM.2.2.activity: Are reported security issues found tracked thought-out its fix process?

CMVM.2.3.activity: Is there an operation inventory of deployed applications?

CMVM.3.1.activity: Are all reported security issues fixed?

CMVM.3.2.activity: Is Security SDL changed in order to prevent creating of reported security issues?
